thread.section_title: Albergo del Senato - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Return Visit
thread.title_full: Return Visit - Review of Albergo del Senato, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Wlisaann
title: Return Visit
text: I stayed at this hotel six years ago and again was delighted with everything about my stay. The location is perfect, not only its position in the square but also how close everything is. I walked everywhere from here, l didn't catch a train, bus or taxi I just walked. The staff are all very pleasant and helpful. The breakfast buffet was fantastic, lots of variety over my six night stay. I enjoyed my coffee outside watching the square wake up and in the evening a glass of wine watching the sun go down. I'll be back!
